trans-unit.source: Reads the bytes from the current stream and writes them to another stream.
trans-unit.target: Reads the bytes from the current stream and writes them to another stream.

trans-unit.source: This method writes directly to the destination stream, rather than copying the data into a temporary buffer.
trans-unit.target: This method writes directly to the destination stream, rather than copying the data into a temporary buffer.

trans-unit.source: The stream to which the contents of the current stream will be copied.
trans-unit.target: The stream to which the contents of the current stream will be copied.

trans-unit.source: A DateTime indicating the expiry time.
trans-unit.target: A DateTime indicating the expiry time.
